name: Elysys
tagline: Solutions for the Finance & Investment Management
description:
Elysys is member of an international group of companies with diverse activities. It has been established in the Principality of Monaco since 1993 and our mission is to deliver affordable, flexible and innovative solutions to the global finance industry.

Elysys develops and markets software which are add-on solutions for Microsoft Dynamics NAV, targeting investment and portfolio, private wealth and asset managers who are looking for a complete integrated Financial & Investment management solution.
Other Elysys products enhance the capability of Microsoft Dynamics NAV in treasury and cash management, by enabling users to schedule, control and account for loans, borrowings and deposits. In combination with in-house developed corporate management and other related modules, Elysys provides a unique proposition to the finance industry.
